We are in the process of moving to our new location of 358 Columbia Drive Carrollton, GA 30117. (Old Drop and Shop Location)  Drop and Shop has moved into  450 Columbia Drive Carrollton, GA 30117.    Giving Hearts Client Choice Pantry is  CLOSED to the public during the month of September.   We have relocated and are moving into our new space.  We will begin accepting Clients on Tuesday, October 1, 2024.   PLEASE DO NOT LEAVE ANY VOICE MESSAGES AS WE WILL NOT BE RESPONDING.  Again, we will begin accepting clients on October 1, 2024.", "contactName": "Giving Hearts Client Choice Pantry", "contactPhone": "678-601-3181", "contactEmail": "givinghearts2014@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 42, "regionName": "Atlanta Community Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "17b4255f-0222-445e-984f-653525137fd3.png", "website": "https://www.acfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Thursday 10:00 AM-2:00 PM", "Saturday 10:00 AM-12:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
